name: Create ReferralHero subscribers from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new subscriber is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add a new subscriber to a selected ReferralHero campaign. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bOYG-7XEcXgq-gu-rOI3KA2xT9W7Y019UojgniiGji0/edit?usp=sharing).
